      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void combine_style(javafx.scene.text.Text text2, java.lang.String added_style)
      this is used to combine multiple formats on a text, since Node.setStyle(String) overrides previous styles
      private java.util.List<javafx.scene.text.Text> getFormattedTexts()
      the content(string) is split into an array of strings based on hte closing tags then split again based on the opening tags using regex's
      void initData(Article article)
      initialize content of the preview window, based on the contents of the Dashboard, called by DashboardController.preview_btn_click(ActionEvent) using getFormattedTexts() the content of the content box is split and formatted into multiple Text objects and stored in a List, all elements of the list is then added to the textflow_box
      void initialize()
      disable editing in the preview window
      private void split_format(java.util.List<javafx.scene.text.Text> textslist, java.lang.String to_split, java.lang.String delimiter, java.lang.String css_format)
      this is used to format an split string that has been previously been split based on closing tags

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        disable editing in the preview window

      • initData

        public void initData(Article article)
        initialize content of the preview window, based on the contents of the Dashboard, called by DashboardController.preview_btn_click(ActionEvent) using getFormattedTexts() the content of the content box is split and formatted into multiple Text objects and stored in a List, all elements of the list is then added to the textflow_box
        Parameters:
        article - Article object

      • getFormattedTexts

        private java.util.List<javafx.scene.text.Text> getFormattedTexts()
        the content(string) is split into an array of strings based on hte closing tags then split again based on the opening tags using regex's
        Returns:
        return a list of formatted texts

      • split_format

        private void split_format(java.util.List<javafx.scene.text.Text> textslist,
                          java.lang.String to_split,
                          java.lang.String delimiter,
                          java.lang.String css_format)
        this is used to format an split string that has been previously been split based on closing tags
        Parameters:
        textslist - list of text that the formatted texts will be added to
        to_split - string to be split again and formatted
        delimiter - opening tags that can be used to split the string
        css_format - format of the Text object

      • combine_style

        private void combine_style(javafx.scene.text.Text text2,
                           java.lang.String added_style)
        this is used to combine multiple formats on a text, since Node.setStyle(String) overrides previous styles
        Parameters:
        text2 - text
        added_style - style to combine
